questions.question: What is supervised learning?
questions.description: Please select the correct answer from the options below.

options.text: A type of machine learning using labeled data to make predictions.
A learning method that requires no human intervention.
A learning algorithm specifically for image recognition.
A hardware component that increases processing speed.

questions.question: What is unsupervised learning?
questions.description: Please select the correct answer from the options below.

options.text: A method to predict outcomes using labeled data.
A method to find hidden patterns in unlabelled data.
A technique exclusively for image recognition.
A hardware technique for faster computation.
